document_data.name: Carmathan Red
document_data.mainbody: The '''Carmathan Red''', also called the '''Carmathan Horse-Ox''', was a breed of [[horse]] found in [[Carmathan]] in the [[Bloodstone Lands]].
document_data.Description: The breed of horse was renowned for its strength and durability. They were favored for use as [[plow]]horses.
document_data.History: Carmathan Reds were bred and sold exclusively in the duchy of Carmathan in [[Damara]], usually during [[Ravensburg]]'s horse market each spring. Their popularity and use had spread throughout the Bloodstone Lands as of the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
